overview: In the harsh world of a lonely person, a bird appears outside the window. The window turns out to be a shop window, and the bird - a dream that can be bought.  The titular bird symbolizes the dream of freedom of the protagonist, who is a slave of her own material limitations. The film was realized in the cut-out technique, in grayscale, with dominant geometric shapes with acute vertices, in the style of expressionist paintings.
title: Bird
